Detailed Description

Base class for all image exporters.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzVideoExporter::DzVideoExporter ( const QString &  extension  ) 

Creates a new video exporter. This is usually only called by the constructors of child classes to set the extension they support.

Parameters:
extension The file extension (type) that this exporter saves to.
DzVideoExporter::~DzVideoExporter (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

QString DzVideoExporter::getDescription (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
A description of the exporter that can be placed in a file type selection combo box (e.g. "AVI Format")
QString DzVideoExporter::getExtension (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The extension that this exporter will force filenames to (excluding the preceeding '.').
bool DzVideoExporter::isFileExporter (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
true if this exporter writes to a 'real' file. Derived classes should override this to indicate whether or not they are writing out to a real file. Exporters can, if they want to, write to entities other than files (e.g. sockets, pipes, etc.)

) [slot]

Writes the file.

Parameters:

Returns:
